ComicInfo.Summary:
The Snow Queen-When a freak blizzard shuts down a small Midwestern town stranding Skye and Lance they quickly discover the snowstorm is much more than it seems. Both Highborn's find themselves in a fight for their lives against a new enemy that has invaded the Grimm Universe.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Drew Edward Johnson & Ceci de la Cruz | 1 | B | Cover B | Jose Luis & Sanju Nivangune | 2 | C | Cover C | Allan Otero & Ceci de la Cruz | 3 | D | Cover D | Antonio Bifulco & Hedwin Zaldivar | 4 |
